values: Groaning Creation, Groaning Saints, Groaning SpiritGroaning Creation, Groaning Saints, Groaning Spirit

The groaning of creation matches up with our own groaning as we wait until the day when creation will be set free from corruption and share in the glorious inheritance of God’s children.The groaning of creation matches up with our own groaning as we wait until the day when creation will be set free from corruption and share in the glorious inheritance of God’s children.
